data.title: Template:Country data Portugal
data.text:
Template:Country data Portugal is an internal data container not intended to be transcluded directly. It is used indirectly by templates such as flag, flagicon, and others.

Standard parameters

Parameter nameValueMeaning alias Portugal Main article name (Portugal) flag alias Flag of Portugal.svg Image name (File:Flag of Portugal.svg, shown on right)

Flag variants

LabelFlag image (40px)Image name 1248PortugueseFlag1248.svg1385PortugueseFlag1385.svg1495Flag Portugal (1495).svg1578Flag Portugal (1578).svg1640Flag Portugal (1640).svg1707Flag Portugal (1707).svg1750Flag of Portugal (1750).svg1816Flag of the United Kingdom of Portugal, Brazil, and the Algarves.svg1830Flag Portugal (1830).svgcivilFlag Portugal sea (1830).svgair forcePortugal Air force fin flash.svgarmyMilitary flag of Portugal.svg

Military ensigns

This nation's naval ensign is the same as its national flag, so Template:Navy produces the following:

{{navy|Portugal}} → Portuguese Navy

This template includes an air force ensign flag variant that can be used with Template:Air force:

{{air force|Portugal}} → Portuguese Air Force

{{flagicon|Portugal|air force}} →

This template includes an army ensign flag variant that can be used with Template:Army:

{{army|Portugal}} → Portuguese Army

{{flagicon|Portugal|army}} →

Redirect aliases

This template can also be used via an alias name (implemented as a redirect to this template):

Alias name{{flag|alias}} output{{flagcountry|alias}} output PRT ( )Template:Country data PRTTemplate:Country data PRTPOR ( )Template:Country data PORTemplate:Country data POR

See What links here for a full list of redirects.

Example usage

{{flag|Portugal}} → Portugal

{{flagicon|Portugal}} →

Using a flag variant

{{flag|Portugal|1248}} → Portugal

{{flagicon|Portugal|1248}} →

Using a redirect alias

{{flagicon|PRT}} → Template:Country data PRT

{{flagcountry|PRT}} → Template:Country data PRT

{{flag|PRT}} → Template:Country data PRT

Related templates

Please see the following related country_data templates:

Template:Country data Portuguese EmpireTemplate:Country data Portuguese Empire

TemplateData

This is the TemplateData for this template used by TemplateWizard, VisualEditor and other tools. Click here to see a monthly parameter usage report for this template in articles based on this TemplateData.
